---

**Introduction**

Many techniques in modern computational linguistics and natural language processing (NLP) assume that approaches that work well on English and other widely used European (and sometimes Asian) languages are "language agnostic"—meaning they will also work across the typologically diverse languages of the world. In high-resource languages, especially those that are analytic rather than synthetic, a common approach is to treat morphologically distinct variants of a common root (such as dog and dogs) as completely independent word types. This relies on two main assumptions: that there are a limited number of morphological inflections for any given root and that most or all of those variants will appear in a large enough corpus, allowing the model to learn statistics about each variant adequately.

Approaches like stemming, lemmatization, morphological analysis, subword segmentation, or other normalization techniques are frequently used when either of these assumptions are likely to be violated, particularly in synthetic languages like Czech and Russian, which have more inflectional morphology than English.

**Challenges in Morphologically Complex Languages**

Within the NLP literature, agglutinative languages like Finnish and Turkish are commonly highlighted as examples of morphological complexity that challenge common modeling assumptions. However, considering all of the world's languages, Finnish and Turkish are closer to the average case regarding synthesis. Polysynthetic languages, which represent the extreme of morphological complexity, present unique challenges. Approaches like stemming, lemmatization, or subword modeling may not suffice for these languages, which often have very high numbers of hapax legomena (words appearing only once in a corpus). This underscores the necessity for appropriate morphological handling of words to capture enough statistical information. Moreover, many of these languages have very small text corpora, which substantially magnifies these challenges.

**Structure of the Work**

In Chapter 2, we briefly review relevant background literature in finite-state morphology, language modeling, and machine translation. We review finite-state approaches to morphological analysis and major approaches to language modeling, including n-gram language models, feed-forward language models, and recurrent neural language models.

Chapter 3 presents a set of polysynthetic languages we will consider throughout this work and details the resources available for each. Our focus is on Inuit-Yupik, a highly challenging family of endangered polysynthetic languages ranging geographically from Greenland through northern Canada and Alaska to far eastern Russia. These languages are extraordinarily challenging from a computational perspective due to the pervasive use of derivational morphemes in addition to rich sets of inflectional suffixes and phonological challenges at morpheme boundaries.

In Chapters 4-6, we examine the current state-of-the-art in language modeling, machine translation, and predictive text completion in the context of four polysynthetic languages: Guaraní, St. Lawrence Island Yupik, Central Alaskan Yup'ik, and Inuktitut. Chapter 4 presents experiments and results on machine translation into, out of, and between polysynthetic languages. We conduct experiments between various Inuit-Yupik languages and English, as well as between Guaraní and Spanish, demonstrating that multilingual approaches incorporating data from higher-resource members of the language family can effectively improve translation into lower-resource languages.

In Chapter 5, we present language modeling experiments across a range of languages and vocabularies. Chapter 6 discusses practical applications that may benefit from our language model and multilingual approaches, along with preliminary experimental results and a discussion of future work.

**Core Contributions and Future Directions**

Finally, in Chapter 7, we present a core theoretical contribution: a feature-rich open-vocabulary interpretable language model designed to support a wide range of typologically and morphologically diverse languages.

Driverless Cars

In today's world, technology plays a crucial role in our lives, with innovations constantly reshaping our way of living. Every day, a genius comes up with ideas that change the way we do things forever. One such innovation is the advent of driverless cars, which are expected to become a reality in the near future. However, this technology raises significant safety concerns. Can individuals truly trust a car to drive itself? It’s essential to consider this question carefully. How dangerous could the concept of driverless cars be?

While exploring the topic, I’ve found numerous arguments highlighting the potential dangers of driverless cars. Is it wise to place our trust in a vehicle that operates based on a computer system? According to some reports, a driver still needs to be cautious, especially in situations such as navigating through work zones and around accidents. Accidents are a frequent occurrence, particularly involving cars. By handing control to a computer, are we jeopardizing our safety and, in a way, our lives? The uncertainty, the constant “what if” scenarios, can be overwhelming. 

For instance, can a driverless car be trusted to keep you safe if you fall asleep at the wheel, or, if you are distracted, to steer you in the right direction while you are absorbed in your phone? If such questions, time and again, raise doubts, can the technology truly be considered safe?

Since Man was birthed into this world kicking and screaming, so was His primal hunger. His insatiable, unsatisfiable libido for conquest, for sustenance, for surviving one more day on this cold, unforgiving rock. His apex dominance was asserted over lesser species by consuming their very flesh and blood, by making Himself whole out of what made them whole. To hunt was Man's oldest routine, but day after day he'd devise newer, more creative ways to prepare the kill.

The Man laid a large mound of lesser flesh down under the fires that fueled His hunger. He watched as the blood drained from the lifeless meat, slowly dehydrating and browning from a cold pinkish hunk to a darker shade. Man took advantage of one of His greatest evolutional strengths, *opposable thumbs*, and with that He seamlessly butchered through the flesh with a calloused efficiency, slicing the hunk bit by bit, sinew by sinew into chunks with the blade held up by His opposable thumb. The smoke of starvation rose up to Man's nose, whetting his appetite more and more.

To assert His dominance further, Man adorned His kill with something that the lesser species couldn't; agricultural garnishes. He hacked through the layers of the onion one by one, sautéing them up with the exact same cold efficiency as before. The smoke was overwhelming now, uncontrollably billowing through the air, signaling that it was finally time for Man to release His urges.

Man laid his kill in-between one sliced hunk of wheat.

被戏称为「暴大」的中大校园前日变成「战场」。学生在二号桥向马路投掷物品堵路，警方到场清场。与学生及示威者上演攻防战，警方发射逾千枚催泪弹、橡胶子弹等各式弹药，学生则投掷汽油弹还击。当晚情况极为危急，民主派曾呼吁社会贤达向当权者施压，「救学生于水火」。现时不少高官、议员出身中大，对于校园沦为战场、警方进入校园执法有何看法？中大校友、工联会立法会议员何启明指出，学生向吐露港公路掷物，影响公众安全，警方进入校园执法是合情合理。他批评中大校长段崇智处理不周，亦无法控制学生。何启明提到立法会财委会将审议中大兴建教学大楼拨款，若校方未能保障大楼学生安全，拨款未必容易通过。有建制派校友认为不要只把责任交给校长，亦有人寄语学生「不值得为一届政府牺牲前途」。

至少5位建制议员出身中大。现届建制派立法会议员中，多人毕业于中大，包括民建联的陈克勤、刘国勋，工联会的麦美娟、何启明，经民联的梁美芬等。官场方面，最出名的校友可说是财政司司长陈茂波，他于1977年毕业于中大新亚会计系。几年前身陷囤地风波时，曾引述新亚校歌「艰险我奋进」自勉。麦美娟因长期服务工联会，给人印象较贴近基层，但其实她是中大英文系出身。中大人对于「二号桥战役」无不激动。冲突当日已有大批中大人自发运送物资，或从不同渠道支援学生。一直以中大人身份自居的港视主席王维基，更在网上呼吁称「中大人 回中大 保中大 抗警暴」。

警方强攻中大校园上演「催泪弹放题」，引起争议。建制派中大人是否支持警方行动？毕业于中大哲学系、过去三年出任中大校董的工联会何启明认为责任不在警方，而是示威者威胁市民安全，把杂物抛到吐露港公路，危害道路安全，警方才进入校园范围内的二号桥执法。何启明认为有人提出支援中大是「火上加油」。

何启明指出，中大二号桥位置平时人迹罕至。「读四年书可能只经过一次」。批评学生借二号桥作违法行为，警方执法唯一目的是防止有人再向吐露港公路掷物，确保道路安全。「吐露港时速110公里，突然有杂物掉下来，对道路使用者非常危险，警察先要守住二号桥」。但期间受示威者以汽油弹攻击，只能以相应武力还击。对于中大校长段崇智曾到场调停，期间警方施放催泪弹，何启明指当时段校长走向警方，有大批学生跟在后面，部分人手持武器。「校长根据无法控制学生做」，警方无可选择下才发射催泪弹。他批评校方一开始已处理不周，应封锁中大校园范围内的「环回东路」，阻止有人向吐露港公路掷物。他又指，有人视大学校园「神圣不可侵犯」，甚至打仗亦不会攻击大学。他认为「无需要扯到咁远」，「唔通明知有危险而不处理？」又对有人召集中大校友回校支援「不明所以」，质疑只会火上加油。立法会财委会将审议在大埔第39区兴建一座教学科研综合大楼，助中大提升医疗教学设施，涉款近6千万元。何启明说，该大楼邻近吐露港公路及东铁线，校方必须清楚解释如何确保大楼落成后，不会有人用作攻击位置，向公路掷物。审议时他会积极发言，但现阶段未决定投票立场。

对中大出现严重警民冲突，毕业于中大英文系的麦美娟表示不开心。校园设施遭到破坏，亦有学生受伤。她认为政府应严正执法，确保市民可使用安全道路。

Coopération Sanitaire : Renforcement de l'axe Dakar-Banjul

Le Ministre sénégalais de la Santé et de l'Action sociale, Abdoulaye Diouf Sarr, a tenu une réunion de travail avec son homologue gambien, Ahmadou Lamin Samateh, en visite au Sénégal depuis le 22 juin 2021. Cette rencontre, qui s'est déroulée au ministère ce vendredi, a permis aux deux ministres d'aborder plusieurs points : le renforcement des relations entre les deux ministères en matière de traitement des patients gambiens, la formation des médecins et chercheurs gambiens, la coopération bilatérale en matière de fournitures médicales, le renforcement des compétences des spécialistes et des recherches transfrontalières.

Le Ministre de la Santé de la Gambie était accompagné de certains de ses collaborateurs, notamment son Secrétaire permanent Muhamadou Lamin Jaiteh, son Directeur des services de santé Mustapha Bittaye, son Directeur des services pharmaceutiques Babading Sabaly et l'Ambassadeur de la Gambie à Dakar, Adrameh Sidibeh.

Ahmadou Lamin Samateh a salué l'excellence des relations entre les deux pays, notamment dans le domaine sanitaire, soulignant l'engagement du Sénégal dans la lutte contre la Covid-19 en Gambie et la formation des professionnels de la santé gambiens. Le Ministre de la Santé de la Gambie a exprimé le souhait d'une collaboration plus étroite entre les chercheurs des deux pays et a sollicité le maintien du solide soutien du Sénégal.

Abdoulaye Diouf Sarr a assuré à son homologue de la disponibilité totale du Sénégal à accompagner la république sœur de la Gambie, conformément aux souhaits des présidents Macky Sall et Adama Barrow, conscients des enjeux d'une coopération bilatérale renforcée. Le Ministre sénégalais de la Santé a salué l'amitié sénégalo-gambienne et s'est engagé à favoriser une approche collaborative dans les prestations médicales.

Le Conseiller technique en charge de la coopération, Cheikh Tidiane Guèye, a dressé un bilan des actions menées par les deux pays en matière de coopération sanitaire, mettant en avant l'échange et la mutualisation des compétences, la formation des chercheurs et des éducateurs en santé en collaboration avec l'École nationale de Développement sanitaire et social (ENDSS) et l'Université Cheikh Anta Diop de Dakar (UCAD), la coopération pharmaceutique avec des progrès notables dans la collaboration avec la PNA, notamment l'accord entre les deux centrales d'achats, le soutien du Sénégal dans le traitement des maladies que le système de santé gambien ne peut pas gérer, le renforcement des liens avec le centre d'opérations d'urgence sanitaire à travers des réunions mensuelles sur Zoom, la demande d'assistance de spécialistes sénégalais en cas d'urgence, et les recherches communes avec l'Institut Pasteur impliquant l'envoi de techniciens de chaque pays en raison de la proximité géographique.

路透社马尼拉9月22日电 - 由于需求放缓及标普调降中国信用评级的影响，周五中国钢材、铁矿石及焦煤价格跌至数周低位，创下数月来单周最大跌幅。

钢材期货的跌势蔓延至炼钢原料价格，进一步回调今年由供给侧改革导致的涨势。今年的涨势主要受益于中国削减过剩产能的政策。

上海期货交易所的主力螺纹钢合约收盘下跌4.5%，至每吨3,554元人民币，盘中一度触及3,527元的7月31日以来低点。本周螺纹钢累计下跌近6%，为2016年12月以来的单周最大跌幅。

大连商品交易所的主力铁矿石合约一度跌至463.50元人民币，为7月17日以来的最低水平。本周累计下跌8%，创下自5月初以来的最大周线跌幅。

济南的一名交易员表示：“预计冬季铁矿石需求将走软，因为钢厂减产，而铁矿石供应将增加。去年第四季度，全球铁矿石生产商的产量已经有所增长。”

中国政府要求包括河北省在内的主要产钢地区的钢厂在冬季最多减产一半，以改善空气质量。

根据Metal Bulletin的数据显示，运抵青岛港的铁矿石价格周四大跌5.1%，报每吨66.09美元，为7月14日以来的最低点。

标普周四下调了中国长期主权信用评级，这也打击了投资者对大宗商品的信心，导致镍和锌等基本金属价格下跌。

法国媒体评选世界十大俱乐部：皇马巴萨领先

《法国足球》杂志近日评选出世界十大俱乐部，其中皇家马德里和巴塞罗那位列前两名，远超排名第三的曼联。

根据《法国足球》的评选，皇马和巴萨占据了榜单的前两位。这一榜单基于多项指标，包括球员水平、电视观众人数、社交媒体关注度、比赛场均观众人数、收入与支出、球队市场价值以及历史重要性。

此次评选共考察了85家俱乐部，最终皇马和巴萨稳居前两名，与第三名的曼联拉开了显著差距。

虽然榜单前十名中有五家英超俱乐部，但西甲仅有皇马和巴萨两支球队入选，德甲、意甲和法甲则各有一支球队跻身前十。

以下是《法国足球》评选出的世界十大俱乐部：

1. 皇家马德里，184分
2. 巴塞罗那，177分
3. 曼联，151分
4. 拜仁慕尼黑，135分

周二（13日）的交易中，脱欧问题迎来了一些积极消息。此外，美元在周一攀升至16个月高位后出现了获利了结，导致欧元和英镑的走势上涨。

英国内阁办公室大臣David Lidington表示，英国和欧盟即将达成脱欧协议的迹象。谈判代表正在努力避免错过最后期限。

市场上对脱欧条款的不确定性造成了欧元和英镑的波动。欧盟和英国都需要达成协议以确保双边经济畅通。交易员们认为，周二欧元的涨势受到了限制，主要是因为市场对意大利预算案的担忧以及德国投资者信心数据的悲观。

多伦多XE的交易员Viash Sreemuntoo表示：「欧盟和英国即将达成脱欧协议的消息为欧元注入了短期资金。」

脱欧协议的积极消息使英镑兑欧元汇率达到了6个半月来的高点。同时，英镑兑美元也收复了周一的大部分跌幅。

欧元兑美元上涨了0.38%，至1.12770美元，此前曾跌至1.1216美元，触及2017年6月以来的最低水平。欧元兑英镑下跌了0.29%，至87.05便士，早盘一度触及86.82便士，为4月26日以来的最低水平。

英镑兑美元上涨了0.89%，至1.126美元，收复了周一近1%的跌幅。而ICE美元指数下降了0.19%，至97.36，自周一的16个月高点97.693后有所下跌。

与英国利多消息相反，意大利的预算问题继续拖累了欧元。周二，意大利（欧元区第三大经济体）再次提出了对欧盟的预算最后期限，若不修正后再次提交，欧盟将会对意大利进行处罚。IMF周二发出警告称，政府的刺激方案已使意大利变得脆弱。

意大利与欧盟之间的紧张气氛让市场担心意大利可能会退出欧元区。

This technology holds immense value for the classroom, potentially revolutionizing how teachers approach education. It can help educators determine if a student is ready to advance to a higher level of learning. The FACS program offers a window into a new classroom experience.

This computer technology can read a person's emotions in real time. For instance, if most students are getting bored during a class, the program can alert the teacher, allowing them to adjust the lesson plan for the following day. It can also detect confusion, a significant concern for teachers who worry that a student might not understand the material. The program can pinpoint a specific student struggling with an assignment, enabling the teacher to provide the necessary clarification.

The FACS can distinguish between a genuine smile and a forced smile. For example, if a teacher is reevaluating a lesson plan, the program can assess what students genuinely find interesting. It analyzes the individual muscles in the face, allowing the teacher to discern if a student is lying. Using the program to detect dishonesty can not only prevent a student from harming themselves but can also protect others.

FACS can read six basic emotions, a capability with limitless potential. It analyzes the muscles of the face to determine the emotions a student is displaying. The program recognizes the movements of the facial muscles, assigning emotions to the corresponding gestures. Knowing the program can detect the most subtle expressions can help a teacher assess a student’s readiness to advance to the next learning level. This, in turn, can guide the teacher in the student’s educational journey.

The FACS program opens the door to the possibilities of a whole new learning approach. Its ability to read confusion and boredom can provide a deeper understanding of the student’s mindset.

Another night, another dream, another encounter with it—the pendulum of wisdom, the great center of creation, suspended in the all-encompassing abyss of time. It swung wildly between reason and mystery, the known and the arcane, knowledge and power. It moved slowly and steadily, generation after generation, century after century, millennium after millennium. The great emotionless creator and destroyer had haunted me for months, but that night was different. In the dimensionless void of pure concept, I saw the pendulum freeze momentarily somewhere between an instant and eternity, then begin falling back. Slowly at first, it gained speed with each second as the primordial anchor rushed toward me. 

I awoke in my bed, sweat dripping down my forehead. As my breathing steadied, countless questions swarmed my mind. *Why does this keep happening? Am I going insane? Should I talk to someone?* Yet deep within me was a different impulse, a thought not described in words but felt with every fiber of my being. Slowly, without fully understanding—or perhaps not wanting to understand—the reason, I got up and walked over to my telescope, my heart pounding faster than ever before. I looked through the device. 

A strange cold washed over me as I understood what I was seeing. The stars moved, flowed, and changed positions, disappearing and re-emerging in a delirious dance. I stepped back, staring at the telescope. This device, this tool of science that had been my guide to reason for years and decades, now mocked me with visions of the impossible, exposing my madness to the remnants of rationality within my mind. 

In a fit of rage, I grabbed the tripod and raised it above my head, intending to smash it against the floor. But suddenly, it clicked. The pendulum in my dreams made sense. The dancing patterns of these supposedly colossal celestial bodies formed a system. Gently, I put the telescope down, aimed it at a random cluster of stars, and gazed inside. Yes, it was obvious, so obvious. 

It wasn't just me; the world itself had undergone a metamorphosis, a change in laws, a re-establishment of something long forgotten and primal. Grabbing my notebook from the desk, I began writing it all down. Arcane formulas, magic incantations, the long-forgotten wisdom in the stars, fated to wait its turn for centuries, were now mine! From the wise words of Nostradamus to the mad ramblings of Abdul Alhazred, it was all part of one big system, and I was destined to be its next chosen one. 

For years, I had been guided by books; for decades, I had followed the path of men long dead.

Cuca Gamarra, portavoz del PP en el Congreso, antes de una reunión de la Junta de Portavoces.

Para los 'populares', al reservarse el dictamen únicamente para conocimiento del Ejecutivo, se cometió "una actuación sumamente obstructiva del ejercicio pleno de la función legislativa".

El Partido Popular ha interpuesto un recurso de amparo ante el Tribunal Constitucional por la convalidación del decreto de los fondos europeos sin el informe del Consejo de Estado, tras la negativa del Gobierno a remitir dicho informe y el rechazo de la presidenta del Congreso, Meritxell Batet, a abordar esta cuestión en el Congreso y a solicitar una copia del mismo.

En su recurso, con fecha de 12 de febrero, según informó este sábado el PP, se señala que "dicha ocultación imposibilitó que el Congreso de los Diputados pudiera expresar su voluntad conociendo todos y cada uno de los elementos a tener en consideración, viciándose la voluntad de la Cámara al privársele, al despojársele deliberadamente, de la información necesaria para formarse una opinión completa sobre la cuestión".

El PP recuerda también que su portavoz en el Congreso, Cuca Gamarra, solicitó a la presidenta del Congreso, a través de una serie de iniciativas, una reunión urgente y extraordinaria de la Mesa en la que se acordara dirigirse al Gobierno para que remitiera dicho dictamen a la Cámara.

Además, solicitó que los servicios jurídicos emitieran un informe sobre la validez de dicho decreto y si pudiera ser objeto de nulidad, así como reiterar al presidente del Gobierno sus obligaciones constitucionales, entre ellas remitir al Parlamento los expedientes completos de elaboración de las normas. Sin embargo, según el PP, Batet rechazó abordar de forma urgente dicha ocultación.

Por ello, en el PP creen que si el Tribunal Constitucional reconoce la petición de amparo solicitada, se daría marcha atrás en la tramitación. Las consecuencias de la vulneración se fijarán en la sentencia y lo habitual es retrotraerse al momento en que se ha vulnerado el derecho.

El Partido Popular critica al Gobierno por no incluir el informe solicitado al Consejo de Estado sobre el real decreto-ley que desarrolla los instrumentos para la captación de los fondos europeos y cuya convalidación logró el Gobierno en el Congreso con la abstención de Vox, pese al voto negativo de PP y ERC, entre otros.

"Patio Limpio" es una campaña de descacharrización creada por la Municipalidad de Gualeguaychú con el objetivo de concienciar y trabajar para detener la propagación del dengue en los barrios, fomentando la limpieza o eliminación de objetos en desuso que puedan favorecer la presencia de criaderos de mosquitos.

DESCACHARRIZAR: paso a paso
TAPAR
- Tanques, cubos y depósitos que puedan acumular agua
- Colocar mosquiteros en puertas y ventanas

LAVAR
- Renovar el agua de floreros, bebederos de mascotas y macetas cada tres días
- Cepillar o fregar las paredes de los recipientes para eliminar los huevos de mosquito
- Mantener limpia y clorada el agua de la piscina incluso fuera de temporada
- Limpiar las canaletas y desagües para evitar la acumulación de agua

GIRAR
- Todos los objetos que puedan retener agua
- Vaciar baldes, recolectores de aire acondicionado y macetas semanalmente
- Verificar que no se acumule agua cada vez que llueva

TIRAR
- Desechar todos los recipientes en desuso, manteniendo los patios y jardines limpios y desmalezados
- Guardar las cubiertas de los automóviles bajo techo o desecharlas.

¿QUÉ ES EL DENGUE?
Es una enfermedad viral transmitida por la picadura del mosquito Aedes aegypti. Cuando el mosquito se alimenta de una persona infectada con dengue y luego pica a otras personas, les transmite la enfermedad. El contagio se produce únicamente por la picadura de mosquitos infectados, no de persona a persona ni a través de objetos o leche materna. Aunque poco común, las mujeres embarazadas pueden contagiar a sus bebés durante el embarazo.

¿CUÁLES SON LOS SÍNTOMAS?
Los síntomas asociados a la enfermedad son: fiebre, dolor de cabeza, de ojos, musculares y articulaciones, náuseas, vómitos e irritaciones en la piel. Si presentas alguno de estos síntomas, se recomienda:
- No consumir aspirinas ni ibuprofeno, ni aplicarte inyecciones intramusculares
- Consultar a un médico lo antes posible para obtener un diagnóstico preciso

¿CÓMO SE PUEDE PREVENIR?
El mosquito se reproduce en áreas cercanas a las viviendas y solo requiere un poco de agua estancada y sombra para dejar sus huevos y multiplicarse. Cualquier recipiente con agua puede convertirse en un criadero.

Dans son rapport intitulé «Ouïghours à vendre», le think tank Australian Strategic Policy Institute affirme qu’entre 2017 et 2019, au moins 80 000 Ouïghours ont été envoyés dans des usines à travers la Chine, et qu’«au moins 83 marques de portée internationale ont eu recours à ce travail forcé à un moment ou à un autre dans leur chaîne de fabrication».

The so-called "face on Mars" has captured the imagination of many. It looks remarkably human, with features resembling eyes, a nose, and a mouth. This natural formation has sparked widespread curiosity, with some people speculating that it might be evidence of alien life. However, I believe it is simply a natural landform, as there is no definitive proof of alien monuments or artificial structures on Mars.

Since then, it has been widely featured in Hollywood films, books, magazines, and radio shows, solidifying its place in popular culture. People are fascinated by the idea, even though, upon closer inspection, the formation is likely just the result of shadows, lighting, and the human tendency to perceive familiar patterns, a phenomenon known as pareidolia. Permissionless blockchains like Ethereum host tens of millions of smart contracts. A smart contract is a piece of code residing on the Ethereum network, designed to execute when predetermined conditions are met. These contracts handle financial assets worth millions of U.S. Dollars (USD), making them attractive targets for attacks. Such attacks can provide monetary benefits to attackers or cause other damages. Consequently, the frequency of attacks on Ethereum smart contracts has surged rapidly over the past few years.

To combat these attacks, the Ethereum community has developed numerous tools for detecting vulnerabilities in smart contracts. These tools analyze smart contracts and generate vulnerability reports. Their authors use datasets of smart contracts to evaluate the tools' efficiency, correctness, and other parameters. However, the datasets utilized for these evaluations vary significantly, impacting the tools' performance. Thus, it is crucial to assess these tools using a multi-type integrated benchmark suite.

Ren et al. have created a dataset comprising two types of smart contracts: annotated and non-annotated. Unfortunately, the number of annotated contracts is small (less than a thousand), and most are not real-world contracts. Ferreira et al. encountered similar issues with their dataset. Consequently, these datasets do not accurately represent real-world Ethereum smart contracts. There is a pressing need for a benchmark suite containing real-world smart contracts labeled with vulnerabilities.

To address this gap, we present ScrawlD: a dataset of real-world Ethereum smart contracts labeled with vulnerabilities. ScrawlD offers the Ethereum community an unbiased resource for evaluating new and existing tools to analyze vulnerabilities. It includes 6.7K labeled real-world Ethereum smart contracts. Our methodology for labeling the smart contracts is inspired by the work of Ren et al. This paper outlines our solution, which employs various tools to identify and catalog vulnerabilities in the smart contracts. The resulting dataset, ScrawlD, is available at https://github.com/sujeetc/ScrawlD.

Late one night after a concert with my girlfriend as we were waiting for a taxi, all my aspirations, all my hopes and dreams came swirling right down. Pounding footsteps, heaving panting, and the next moment I was on the ground with my life pumping out of me with every beat. My assailant took off running, never to be caught. At first I was confused. Then the realization came. My legs. I couldn't feel my legs. Why could I not feel my legs. 

After that I was wheelchair and building bound. Wheelchair, because my spinal cord had been severed. Building, because I was in a depression, one that I never wanted to leave, one where I wanted to just drink more to forget, to pretend like I could still walk, to fall into such a haze that it felt like reality.

Las recientes lluvias en la colonia Guajitos, zona 21 de la capital, han provocado inundaciones. Tristemente, como consecuencia de esto, ha fallecido una menor. David de León, portavoz de la Coordinadora Nacional para la Reducción de Desastres (Conred), ha confirmado esta información.

Según De León, la corriente del agua arrastró a la niña, lo que provocó su muerte por sumersión. La niña, de 2 años de edad, vivía en la 1ª avenida y 5ª calle de la colonia. Después de ser arrastrada por el agua, fue trasladada herida al hospital Roosevelt, pero lamentablemente falleció al llegar.

En la colonia Guajitos, 18 habitaciones alquiladas por familias fueron afectadas por las inundaciones, dejando a 56 personas damnificadas. Los Bomberos Municipales informaron que, debido a la situación generada por las fuertes lluvias, se procedió a evacuar a los vecinos.

Además de las inundaciones, también se han reportado otros incidentes causados por las lluvias. En Boca del Monte, un muro perimetral colapsó, dañando un vehículo que transitaba por el área. El desborde del río Platanitos causó inundaciones en calles y avenidas de Villa Hermosa, San Miguel Petapa. También se han registrado la caída de árboles y rótulos, así como la acumulación de agua debido al colapso de drenajes en las zonas 7 y 11 de la capital.

Según la Conred, la temporada de lluvias de 2017 ha dejado un saldo trágico: 17 personas fallecidas, 158,904 afectadas, 1,724 evacuadas y 1,121 damnificadas. Además, se han registrado 174 incidentes y 1,118 viviendas han sufrido daños leves, moderados o severos.

The article "The Challenge of Exploring Venus" delves into the reasons why studying Venus presents significant challenges while attempting to argue that such exploration is worthwhile despite the planet's inherent dangers. Although the author provides some evidence supporting the investment of time in studying Venus, there is a lack of compelling evidence demonstrating its worthiness for exploration despite these risks. Instead, the article primarily focuses on the efforts scientists are making to tackle this challenge.

A major issue with the author's attempt to suggest that Venus warrants exploration is their emphasis on highlighting its challenges rather than persuading readers of its value. As suggested by the title, there's little attempt to convince readers that exploring Venus is worthwhile. While a reason is given for scientists' ongoing interest in reaching its surface—citing possibilities like past oceans and potential life forms similar to Earth's—the article lacks substantial arguments or evidence supporting this pursuit beyond statements like "Venus was probably covered largely with oceans and could have supported various forms of life, just like Earth" and "recall that Venus can sometimes be our nearest option for planetary visits." The reliance on geological aspects does not convincingly support the notion that exploring Venus is justified despite its dangers, resulting in an argument weakened by insufficient evidence.

Despite this flaw, the article excels at explaining different methods and studies aimed at overcoming obstacles related to studying Venus. It provides detailed information about factors such as carbon dioxide levels and atmospheric composition on Venus. The author effectively illustrates why exploring Venus is difficult while offering insights into how scientists aim to surmount these barriers. For instance, NASA's use of simplified electronics made from silicon carbide—tested in chambers simulating conditions on Venus—demonstrates innovations enabling exploration devices' functionality under harsh conditions. The concluding statement emphasizes a broader perspective: "Our travels on Earth and beyond should not be limited by dangers and doubts but should be expanded to meet the very edges of imagination and innovation," thus reinforcing why scientific investment in studying Venus remains valuable.

The standard dialog system development cycle typically involves dialog design, pre-deployment testing, deployment, performance monitoring, model improvement, and iteration. Effective and comprehensive testing at all stages is crucial, as with any production software system. However, evaluating and troubleshooting production TOD systems remains mainly a manual process that demands a significant amount of human interaction. This manual process is time-consuming, costly, and often fails to encompass the vast array of language variations found in the real world (Tan et al., 2021). The labor-intensive nature of this process is compounded when developers make significant changes to dialog flows, necessitating the creation of new test dialog sets (Benvie et al., 2020). Conducting a thorough end-to-end bot evaluation is particularly challenging due to the need for additional annotation efforts. Moreover, the lack of analytical tools for interpreting test results and troubleshooting underlying bot issues poses a significant challenge.

To address these challenges, we introduce BotSIM, a Bot Simulation environment designed for data-efficient end-to-end commercial bot evaluation, remediation through multi-intent dialog generation, and agenda-based dialog user simulation (Schatzmann et al., 2007). BotSIM comprises three key modules: Generator, Simulator, and Remediator (see Figure 1). In the Generator, we employ a pre-trained sequence-to-sequence T5 model (Zhang et al., 2019; Raffel et al., 2020) to simulate lexical and syntactic variations in user queries by paraphrasing. The Generator also produces various templates required by the Simulator. To ensure BotSIM's versatility across platforms and tasks, we utilize dialog-act level ABUS to simulate interactions with bots through APIs. The Generator automatically deduces dialog acts, providing a unified interface to convert various platform-specific bot designs into a universal graph representation. This graph maps all dialogs as nodes and their transitions as edges, allowing BotSIM to systematically generate and explore multi-intent conversations. The capability to generate conversation paths significantly enhances evaluation coverage, aiding in diagnosing dialog errors stemming from flawed designs (e.g., unexpected dialog loops) and facilitating bot design enhancements. The Remediator presents a dashboard summarizing the bots' status for easy understanding, scrutinizes simulated interactions to pinpoint issues, and offers actionable recommendations for resolution.

The "generation-simulation-remediation" framework of BotSIM can considerably expedite bot development and evaluation, lessening human involvement, costs, and time-to-market. Our key contributions include:
• Introducing BotSIM, a modular, data-efficient bot simulation environment, which, to our knowledge, is the first work centered on end-to-end evaluation, diagnosis, and remediation of commercial bots using ABUS.
• Providing a methodical approach through BotSIM to generate and simulate multi-intent dialogs, ensuring comprehensive evaluation coverage and enhanced bot design.

Deep neural networks (DNNs) are commonly trained using various forms of stochastic gradient descent (SGD). These techniques involve updating a network's parameters based on the gradients of the loss with respect to those parameters. DNNs possess numerous degrees of freedom, represented by weights, making their objective functions highly dimensional. For instance, ResNet50 boasts over 23 million trainable parameters. The "loss landscape" shares the same number of dimensions as the weight space, plus one, since each possible DNN configuration is assessed for its loss across a set of test examples, not encountered during training.

The initial sections of this paper delve into the theoretical groundwork of the loss landscape and introduce the visualization method employed. The loss landscape, also known as the "loss surface" or "objective landscape," is created by computing the loss of various points in the weight space, representing different DNN configurations. Subsequently, the paper presents the lottery ticket hypothesis (LTH) and iterative magnitude pruning (IMP) introduced by Frankle and Carbin (2019), applying the same loss visualization to the winning lottery tickets (WLTs) generated through IMP.

All the figures in the paper are linked to the same data available on the LossPlot (Bain et al., 2021) application, an in-browser tool designed specifically to visualize such surface plots. Users can manually adjust the projected contours, the radius of the clippings, and other settings within the LossPlot, which is optimized for the use of the mouse and the keyboard.

La logistique, le clivage générationnel qui nuit à la cohésion, et les frustrations en matière d'avancement caractérisées par l'inversion de la pyramide des grades sont mis en lumière par l'International Crisis Group (ICG) dans son rapport récent intitulé "Nord du Burkina Faso : que cache le jihad". Ces éléments complexifient la lutte des forces de défense et de sécurité burkinabè contre les terroristes sur le terrain. 

Le Burkina Faso n'ayant pas connu de conflits civils ni de guerres contre d'autres pays, il peut être difficile de venir à bout des groupes terroristes opérant dans le nord du pays. Malgré cela, l'expérience du combat acquise par les soldats lors de déploiements en opérations extérieures, notamment au Darfour et au Nord-Mali, peut jouer en leur faveur. 

D'après l'enquête menée par le Crisis Group, les forces burkinabè manquent de moyens aériens et de renseignement pour lutter efficacement contre les groupes armés. Face à un ennemi mobile et bien informé, l'acquisition d'hélicoptères de combat est nécessaire. De plus, il est crucial d'améliorer le renseignement humain pour infiltrer les populations et contrer les groupes jihadistes qui opèrent de manière insidieuse. 

Les forces de sécurité burkinabè souffrent de problèmes plus profonds, notamment un gap générationnel, des rivalités entre police et gendarmerie, ainsi que des lacunes dans la gestion des ressources humaines. Cette situation engendre des frustrations et nuit à la cohésion des troupes, compromettant ainsi leur efficacité dans la lutte contre le terrorisme. 

La réforme du secteur de la sécurité est essentielle pour résoudre les défaillances actuelles et permettre aux forces de sécurité burkinabè de lutter efficacement contre les groupes comme Ansarul Islam. La rivalité historique entre police et gendarmerie constitue également un obstacle à l'opérationnalisation de l'Agence nationale du renseignement.

En 2020 se celebraron 70 años desde el inicio de la Guerra de Corea. Recuerdo que pudimos seguir la guerra gracias al primer radio que llegó a la finca de mis abuelos maternos, ubicada a orillas del selvático río Chiriquí Viejo. La radio nos hizo partícipes de eventos importantes en tierras lejanas.

En la versión impresa, al anochecer, los sonidos diurnos de la selva daban paso a los sonidos nocturnos. Millares de sapos y ranas iniciaban sus cantos en las orillas y playones, mientras que las garzas nocturnas pescaban. Después de lavarnos los pies y dejar los zapatos en la escalera, subíamos y encendíamos la lámpara de kerosén y a la Limeña su vela, una imagen traída del Perú por un ancestro de mi abuela que había servido en las armas del rey cuando el Istmo pertenecía a ese Virreinato.

Después del rosario, llegaban los cuentos de los abuelos y las tías, historias sobre los espíritus de las selvas, las grandes inundaciones y terremotos, los tesoros enterrados, las minas de oro perdidas, los asaltos de piratas y mosquitos en el Panamá colombiano, y sus guerras civiles. Eventos que marcaban el paso del tiempo.

Solo en los pueblos con electricidad había radios. En la finca, las noticias llegaban con la gente que pasaba a caballo, a pie o en bote. Un día, nos avisaron que la tía Tobita, Cristobalina Moreno Caballero, regresaría después de años de estudiar. Se había graduado de la Normal Rural de David y la asignaron a la escuela de Puerto Armuelles. Debido a que era guapa, sufrió acosos por parte de un supervisor, lo que la llevó a abandonar la enseñanza y unirse a la Escuela de Enfermería del Hospital Santo Tomás, en la ciudad de Panamá. Después de graduarse en 1948, fue enviada al hospital de La Palma, en Darién.

Una madrugada, mi abuelo envió el bote grande de la casa a buscarla al embarcadero de Canta Gallo, en Río Piedra, usando palanca y canalete. El entusiasmo reinó durante todo el día. Cada vez que escuchábamos algún sonido de gente embarcada, corríamos al barranco, pero no veíamos nada. Tal vez habían perdido la marea alta o las olas en la Boca de Los Espinos habían volteado el bote. De repente, ya de noche, escuchamos una risa contagiosa de una mujer en el bote que aparecía en la vuelta del río.

Corrimos a abrazar a la tía y bajar su equipaje. Este incluía una caja que nos pidió llevar con cuidado, ya que era un regalo para mi abuelo. Al abrirla, nos deslumbró un aparato que decía RCA Victor Farm Radio, una radio para fincas, con una elegante cobertura de madera, grandes tubos y baterías externas.

Al día siguiente, colocamos la radio al lado de la mecedora del abuelo, quien era el único que sabía cómo encenderla, y le pusimos una manta para protegerlo de la humedad y el polvo. Con mi tío Toño cortamos dos largas varas de cañaza como postes y tendimos un alambre entre ellos para usarlo como antena. Después del rosario, mi abuelo encendió la radio y escuchamos con claridad las emisoras de David y Panamá. Cuando la ajustó a onda corta, se escucharon muchas emisoras en diferentes idiomas extranjeros.

De repente, la Voz de Estados Unidos se escuchó con claridad, transmitiendo en español desde Corea.

哈啰大家好，我是帽帽！今天我们一起来看动物手脚的冷知识吧！

首先，来聊聊无尾熊。无尾熊的生活几乎都离不开尤加利叶树，因此它们的手演化成适合抓住树干的结构。很多有袋类动物，包括无尾熊、袋熊、负鼠和袋鼠，它们的第二和第三根趾头会绑在一起，形成一只带有两个爪子的脚趾。这种特性在袋狸和无尾熊等动物中是独立演化出来的。#CloseUpQuiz 的今天主题就是一只无尾熊的脚。🐨

接下来，我们看看鸟类的脚。一般三趾在前一趾在后的鸟爪称为三前趾，而X型鸟爪称为对生趾。对生趾的结构让鸟类更方便在树枝间攀爬，例如啄木鸟、猫头鹰、杜鹃、鹦鹉以及部分的雨燕都具有这样的特点。

最后，谈谈兔子的脚。兔子的脚掌缺乏肉垫的保护，需要靠厚厚的脚底毛来保护脚底皮肤、肌腱韧带及少量的肌肉等软组织。此外，由于兔子的脚底面积相对较小，全身重量几乎都由两只后脚承担，这会造成不小的压力。如果平时忽略了脚部的照护，就容易引发「足掌炎」。

Le record a été battu vendredi à minuit, dépassant ainsi les 21 jours de « shutdown » pendant l’ère Bill Clinton en 1995-1996. Aucun compromis n’a pu être trouvé entre le président républicain, qui réclame 5,7 milliards de dollars pour construire un mur anti-migrants à la frontière avec le Mexique, et les démocrates, farouchement opposés au projet, jugé « immoral », coûteux et inefficace pour lutter contre l’immigration clandestine.

Samedi matin, Donald Trump a multiplié les gazouillis appelant l’opposition démocrate à « revenir à Washington » pour mettre un terme à ce qu’il a appelé « l’horrible crise humanitaire à la frontière sud ». « Les démocrates pourraient régler le shutdown en 15 minutes ! Appelez votre sénateur ou représentant démocrate. Dites-leur de faire leur boulot ! Crise humanitaire », a-t-il gazouillé.

Il a aussi mentionné des critiques dans le Washington Post sur son absence de plan pour relancer le gouvernement. « En fait, il n’y a presque personne à la Maison-Blanche, sauf moi, et j’ai un plan pour le shutdown », a-t-il écrit.

Le milliardaire républicain avait assuré vendredi ne pas vouloir déclarer « si vite » une procédure d’urgence nationale qui lui permettrait d’utiliser des fonds déjà approuvés par le Congrès pour financer la construction du mur à la frontière. « Ce que nous ne cherchons pas à faire pour l’instant est l’urgence nationale », a-t-il ajouté après des jours de spéculation sur le recours à une telle procédure qui confère des pouvoirs exceptionnels au président. Utiliser une telle prérogative plongerait à coup sûr le pays dans une tempête politico-judiciaire.

Selon plusieurs médias américains, la Maison-Blanche envisagerait de rediriger des fonds d’aide d’urgence pour différents territoires ravagés par des catastrophes naturelles, comme Porto Rico, pour financer la construction d’une barrière à la frontière.

Au Congrès, aucun compromis ne pointe à l’horizon. Le Sénat a suspendu sa séance vendredi en début d’après-midi et ne se réunira pas de nouveau avant lundi.

Les conséquences sont, elles, bien réelles. Pour la première fois vendredi, les 800 000 fonctionnaires fédéraux affectés par le « shutdown » n’ont pas touché leur salaire. Depuis le 22 décembre, la moitié d’entre eux, jugés « non essentiels », ont été placés en congé sans solde, tandis que l’autre moitié a été réquisitionnée.

La Chambre des représentants a approuvé à une écrasante majorité vendredi une loi, déjà votée par le Sénat, garantissant aux employés fédéraux qu’ils soient payés rétroactivement une fois le « shutdown » terminé. Il revient désormais au président de la promulguer. Ce type de mesure est courant aux États-Unis lorsque le pays traverse de telles impasses budgétaires. Mais elle ne concerne pas les millions de contractuels également affectés.

Plusieurs ministères essentiels, comme ceux de la Sécurité intérieure, de la Justice ou des Transports, sont touchés par le « shutdown ». Jeudi, les principaux syndicats du transport aérien — pilotes de ligne, personnel naviguant, contrôleurs aériens — ont dénoncé une situation qui se détériore, évoquant des risques accrus pour la sécurité du pays.

En apenas un año ocupando el cargo en la Roma, Monchi ha vuelto a asombrar al mundo con su fórmula. "La clave de mi trabajo no es vender. Es generar plusvalías para tener una plantilla por encima de tus posibilidades", explicaba Monchi en su etapa de director deportivo del Sevilla. Ayer, el Liverpool pagó al conjunto italiano 67 millones de libras (73 millones de euros) por el portero brasileño de 25 años, Alisson Becker, que se convierte así en el guardameta más caro de la historia del fútbol, superando a Gianluigi Buffon, por quien la Juventus pagó 53 millones de euros al Parma en 2001.

Con la llegada de Alisson, el Liverpool cubre un agujero en su portería que quedó en evidencia en la última final de Champions ante el Real Madrid. Loris Karius, el alemán de 25 años, fichado hace una temporada del Mainz 05 por poco más de seis millones de euros, se convirtió en el objetivo de las críticas después de su calamitosa actuación. Primero regaló un gol a Benzema y después no fue capaz de blocar un disparo lejano y centrado de Bale que se le escurrió entre los guantes. El Liverpool justificó el comportamiento de Karius en aquella final basándose en un estudio en el que aseguraba que el alemán sufrió una conmoción tras un golpe previo con Ramos, pero lo cierto es que apenas dos meses después ha tirado de talonario para tapar su portería.

En enero de 2016, la Roma fichó a Alisson del Internacional de Porto Alegre por 7,5 millones de euros. Aún no estaba Monchi encargado de la compra, pero en la venta, el director deportivo gaditano ha logrado multiplicar por 10 la inversión. En las cerca de 600 operaciones que se gestionaron bajo su mandato directo en el Sevilla, Monchi logró más de 200 millones de euros en plusvalías, con Dani Alves al frente de la lista —costó 1,3 millones de euros en 2000 y fue vendido al Barça en 2008 por 35—.

En la Premier, el récord de coste de un portero lo tenía Ederson, fichado hace un año por el Manchester City por 40 millones de euros. En la Liga, el guardameta más caro es, hasta la fecha, Jan Oblak, por el que el Atlético pagó solo 16 millones de euros al Benfica. Si el Chelsea —que también pretendía a Alisson— encuentra recambio para Courtois, elegido guante de oro del Mundial, el belga recalará en el Real Madrid por una cantidad entre los 35 y 40 millones de euros. Movimientos bajo los palos en una temporada negra para los porteros, de los errores de Karius a la secuencia de catastróficas desdichas del Mundial.

El guardián del ManU, David de Gea, cuestionado por un error previo al torneo en un amistoso ante Suiza (“Mejor cometerlo ahora que en el Mundial”, dijo), hizo un Karius en el primer partido de España ante Portugal, al no atajar un disparo raso y asequible de Cristiano. Su balance final (penaltis ante Rusia en octavos incluidos) fue de once goles recibidos en doce remates a puerta. Lesionado a última hora Romero, Sampaoli, otra figura a la postre oscurecida, entregó las llaves del arco argentino a Caballero, que ante Croacia trató de picar la pelota por encima de Rebic y este la cazó de volea y la envió al fondo de la portería. No volvió a jugar. Tampoco lo hizo, porque cayó eliminado con Uruguay, Muslera. Con 0-1 a su favor en el marcador, Griezmann disparó desde fuera del área sin mayor peligro que la dirección estable de su golpeo entre los tres palos. Sin embargo, la pelota sobrepasó los guantes del portero uruguayo y se alojó mansa junto a la red. “Pido disculpas a la gente y a mis compañeros”, se lamentó el charrúa.

在新冠疫情肆虐的年代，许多预测最终未能实现，对于任何展望2022年的人来说，慎重思考是必要的。大多数预测机构，包括彭博经济研究，认为明年的主要情境是“经济强劲复苏、通胀缓解，货币政策由应急性宽松转向常态化”。然而，可能影响这些预测的意外因素有很多。

Omicron毒株、持续高企的通胀、美联储首次加息、中国恒大危机、台海冲突、新兴市场挤兑、硬脱欧、欧元区新危机、中东“火药桶”、食品价格上涨，所有这些都可能成为导致事态恶化的导火索。

当然，也有一些因素可能比预期更乐观，例如各国政府决定保留财政支持措施，如中国的“十四五”计划。

以下是彭博对2022年可能出现的八大“黑天鹅”事件的预测：

1. Omicron病毒及各国再度封锁
Omicron的影响尚不明确。如果症状较轻，人们可能恢复疫情前的生活状态，彭博预测2022年全球经济增长率有望提升至5.1%。然而，如果各国再次实施封锁，即便仅三个月，也可能将增长率降低至4.2%。消费者在家网购将进一步堵塞全球运输系统，导致物价上涨。

2. 通胀威胁
当前的通胀压力因多重因素累积，美国企业大幅提高薪资，俄罗斯与乌克兰的冲突可能推高天然气等能源价格，而极端气候可能导致粮价飙升。然而，若疫情再度恶化，需求下降可能会抑制能源价格。

3. 美联储加息
美联储收紧货币政策常给市场带来冲击，目前股市及房地产泡沫更加膨胀，使此次紧缩周期尤为棘手。彭博预测，2022年“BEASTs”国家中的新兴经济体，如巴西、埃及、阿根廷、南非和土耳其，将受到最严峻的影响。

4. 中国经济放缓
中国经济在2021年第三季度停滞，不仅面临恒大等房地产商的危机，防疫封锁措施的扩大也会拖累经济。彭博预测，中国2022年的增长率为5.7%，如果降至3%，将严重打击全球原材料市场。

5. 欧洲政治动荡
意大利将在2022年1月改选总统，可能导致联合政府瓦解。法国总统马克龙将在4月的大选中面临右翼挑战。如果意大利和法国等关键国家由疑欧派执政，欧洲央行将失去政治支持，可能引发欧债危机。

6. 财政政策的未来
各国政府在过去一年中频繁发放补贴，但大多数国家已决定停止金援，许多家庭将受到影响。美国财政政策在2021年第二季度从推动增长转变为拖慢复苏，这种冲击将延续到2022年。

La salivation est un phénomène fascinant qui se produit lorsque nous sommes attirés par un aliment. La vue, l'odeur ou même le goût peuvent faire saliver littéralement notre bouche. Mais comment expliquer ce processus surprenant ?

Des scientifiques, dont Hadi Fares, primé lors du concours ACS Chemistry Champions 2015, se sont penchés sur cette question. Leurs recherches ont démontré que les nerfs responsables de la production de salive font partie d'un système réflexe. Ce système peut être activé simplement par la vue, l'odeur ou même un mouvement de mâchoire en présence d'un aliment attrayant.

Pour que ce mécanisme s'enclenche, les stimuli provoqués par les aliments sont transmis au cerveau, plus précisément au bulbe rachidien. Cela déclenche ensuite la libération de neurotransmetteurs tels que l'acétylcholine et la noradrénaline, stimulant ainsi la production de salive.

La salivation est un processus essentiel à la digestion. La salive joue plusieurs rôles, notamment en participant à l'hygiène dentaire, en nous aidant à savourer les aliments et en favorisant la digestion. En effet, l'amylase, une enzyme présente dans la salive, commence à décomposer les aliments avant même qu'ils n'entrent dans l'estomac et les intestins.

La production de salive peut varier en fonction des aliments. Elle peut être plus abondante en présence d'un aliment que l'on apprécie particulièrement ou en raison de certains goûts. Notre bouche peut ainsi produire jusqu'à 1,5 litre de salive par jour.

Cependant, la salivation provoquée par la nourriture ne s'explique pas uniquement par des réflexes. La communauté scientifique est divisée sur le sujet et évoque également l'explication du "réflexe conditionné". Il s'agit d'un réflexe qui n'est pas inné, mais qui se déclenche chez une personne habituée à réagir d'une manière précise à un stimulus. Par exemple, saliver à la vue d'un gâteau au chocolat pourrait être un automatisme dû à une habitude ou à un conditionnement.

Dans la petite commune de Saint-Philbert-sur-Risle, qui compte près de 800 habitants, le calme règne comme à l'accoutumée. Ou presque. Le vendredi 11 janvier 2019, la salle des fêtes est bondée. Qu'ils soient gilets jaunes ou non, ils viennent de Pont-Audemer, de Bernay ou encore du Neubourg. Certains ont trouvé une place assise tandis que d'autres suivent les débats debout ou à travers la fenêtre ouverte, sous un barnum. « J’ai demandé au maire de Montfort-sur-Risle de nous prêter sa salle la prochaine fois car elle peut accueillir 500 personnes », indique le maire en ouverture de la réunion publique.

L'élu, affilié à la gauche politique, est placé derrière une grande table couverte d'une nappe jaune vif. Sur deux panneaux disposés de part et d'autre de la salle, on peut lire « la parole est libre ».

Tellement libre que le maire tient à rappeler les règles de bienséance. « Soyons intelligents. Je ne veux pas d'insultes. Il faut canaliser notre colère. »

Business processes represent transactions internal to or between companies, which take place over a certain amount of time. Business processes do not necessarily have to be supported or executed by a business process management (BPM) system. However, if they are supported by a BPM system, they benefit from coordination, which reduces the effort of the process owner to keep track of tasks, sequence, logging, and so forth.

At the time of execution, business processes are commonly instantiated by the BPM system with all relevant parameters to distribute tasks correctly. The Workflow Management Coalition (WfMC) (1999) defines these parameters, workflow-relevant data, as "data that is used by a Workflow Management System to determine the state transitions of a workflow instance." Long-running processes may require updating or extending these parameters, known as the process's context, during execution to adapt the flow of the process to changing circumstances such as exchange rate fluctuations, weather changes, or traffic congestions impacting logistics processes.

Context-aware information systems have gained more traction in recent years, aiming to provide context to the execution of applications. However, in the BPM domain, research has mostly focused on aspects like process adaptation, process modeling, or managerial aspects of processes. The discussion around describing or implementing an architecture to capture and process context outside the process's control flow has been lacking or has been concentrated on static model configuration or closed environment scenarios like smart factories.

Consider a logistics process involving the delivery of a spare part for a mining machine. If the delivery is at risk of delaying beyond the service level agreement (SLA) due to factors like weather conditions or delays at ports, the machine provider may need to adapt the process by using a different transportation method to meet the SLA. This illustrates the importance of adapting running processes based on context data in real-time scenarios.

为了配合粤港澳大湾区的发展，广州市越秀区的两所公立学校——广州市培正中学和越秀区朝天小学决定开设港澳子弟班，并且招生范围不局限于越秀区，面向全市进行招生。这是内地首个公办的港澳子弟班。预计这个港澳子弟班将在今年9月开班。

《粤港澳大湾区发展规划纲要》提出加强基础教育交流合作，鼓励粤港澳三地中小学校结为姊妹学校，并在广东建设港澳子弟学校或设立港澳儿童班并提供寄宿服务。根据这个规划，广州市培正中学和越秀区朝天小学决定开设港澳子弟班。

据介绍，广州市培正中学的港澳子弟班将开设七年级，越秀区朝天小学的港澳子弟班将开设一年级。每个班级的招生规模不超过35人。招生对象是在广州创业或工作的港澳籍适龄子女，他们的父母必须持有《港澳居民居住证》。朝天小学的港澳子弟班主要招收在广州创业或工作的港澳籍人士的港澳籍适龄子女。

适龄子女是指当年8月31日前年满6周岁但尚未入学的儿童。申请人为适龄儿童的父或母一方。申请人及其港澳籍适龄子女必须持有《港澳居民居住证》，并且申请人在广州市内有合法稳定住所，同时申请人或其配偶在广州市内有合法稳定工作。根据积分入学计算办法，越秀区教育局和学校将根据申请者积分从高到低排序，安排学位。申请人是广州市认定高层次人才、有突出贡献类人员或越秀区认定高端人才的话将有加分选项。

广州市越秀区教育局政策法规与发展规划科科长陈翘介绍说，港澳子弟班学生将独立编班，并且在部分课程、综合实践、课外活动等方面会增进港澳籍学生与本地学生的融合交流。港澳子弟班实行双班主任制，并配备懂粤语的中青年骨干教师担任导师。在执行国家课程的基础上，试点学校将逐步开设兼顾粤港澳特色的相关课程，例如繁体字读写、岭南特色课程、国学课程、国际理解课程以及STEAM等综合科学、综合人文课程。

There was another blockage in section 13-E of the New Albion metropolitan sewers. That's why I'm down here, 100 feet below ground, wearing a hard hat and a handkerchief over my nose. As the chief sewage engineer for the city, it's my job to handle these situations, mainly because no one else has the experience. Besides, having sewage back up into the commercial district is never good for business, and New Albion prides itself on maintaining high standards.

Accompanying me were my two assistants, Joe and Adam. It took us 15 minutes to walk to this section from the nearest access point. The sewer was dark and smelled foul, as expected. The section consisted of a main tunnel, 18 feet tall with a vaulted ceiling. We had carbide lamps on our hats, allowing us to see the center of the tunnel filled with a river of sewage several feet deep. On either side of the river, there was a two-foot-wide sidewalk where we stood. Smaller side tunnels periodically spilled sewer water into the main river. Each smaller tunnel was about shoulder height, just large enough for one person to fit.

"We're here, boys," I said to Joe and Adam. "Let's get to work!" We didn't know the exact location of the blockage, but I suspected it was in one of the smaller tunnels leading to the sewage river. The challenge was finding which one, as there were about a dozen in this section. It was a dirty task, requiring us to stick half our bodies into the tunnels and prod around. My assistants each carried a pole with a hook on the end for this purpose.

Joe and I started checking one side of the main section, while Adam checked the other. He crossed the sewage river via a small bridge at one end of the section. After inspecting four or five small tunnels, I heard Adam call out, "Boss, come here quickly!"

Joe and I turned to see Adam pointing to a small tunnel. I guessed he had found the blockage, but I didn't know why he seemed so frantic. Adam quickly moved toward the small bridge, ready to cross over when he saw Joe and me approaching. He backed away to let us cross, keeping a vigilant eye on the small sewer tunnel.

"What did you see, Adam?" I asked.

"Something large is moving in there!" he replied. It's not uncommon to find living creatures in the sewers, especially in a city as large as New Albion. Rats and small jellies are common. However, for something to plug up a side tunnel, it must be at least the size of a man. I hoped it wasn't a large jelly, as that would take all day to remove.

I approached the side tunnel and peered inside.

Imagine driving past a car with no driver. The concept of driverless cars is indeed intriguing. However, after reading the article, it is clear that despite some appealing features, driverless cars should not be integrated into our daily lives any time soon.

The article highlights several drawbacks of driverless cars, including the need for new traffic laws, the potential for accidents, and concerns about the safety of pedestrians and other drivers. Currently, traffic laws assume that a car is only safe if a human driver is in control, making it illegal in most states to test cars operated by computers.

The safety of driverless cars is also a major concern. Although, as the article notes, these cars are equipped with numerous cameras and sensors, the technology is not yet perfected. The possibility of sensor or camera failure is a significant risk, which could lead to accidents. Such failures compromise the safety of other drivers and pedestrians. Additionally, if a driverless car is involved in an accident, the question of liability arises. New laws would need to be established, solely to accommodate driverless cars, while the alternative of driving our cars remains a viable, less complicated option.

Another downside of driverless cars is the potential loss of jobs. Driving services, which currently rely on human drivers, would no longer need them, leading to unemployment for thousands. This, in turn, would increase the unemployment rate, forcing the government to provide more financial support, as affected families would lose a source of income, a direct consequence of driverless cars replacing human drivers.

In conclusion, driverless cars, while a fascinating concept, seem to generate more issues than they resolve.

The Seagoing Cowboys program offers an extraordinary opportunity to explore the world while making a significant impact. By joining this program, you become a hero, helping to transport cattle overseas to assist communities in need. It’s a chance to travel across the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans, visiting countries you may have never seen before. If you’re ready for a challenge and want to make a difference, the Seagoing Cowboys program is for you.

This program is a life-changing experience, as evidenced by the stories of many who have participated. For example, Luke Bomberger and his friend Don Reist joined the program right after World War II. Motivated by the desire to make a difference, they embarked on a journey to help those affected by the war. Their experience included crossing the Atlantic Ocean 16 times and the Pacific Ocean twice, leaving a lasting impact on the lives of the people they helped.

The Seagoing Cowboys program not only offers the chance to make a difference, but it also brings a sense of fun and challenge. Participants have the opportunity to engage in a variety of activities, from playing sports to participating in tournaments. In the empty holds, you can join in on baseball, volleyball, and other games, and the program even offers activities like table tennis, fencing, and whittling, to help the time pass by enjoyably on the return trips, after the animals have been unloaded.

However, the program also comes with its share of dangers, and it’s important to remain vigilant. Luke Bomberger, for instance, served as a night watchman, a role that required him to check the animals every hour.

Optical flow aims to estimate per-pixel correspondences between a source image and a target image, represented as a 2D displacement field. In many video-related tasks, such as action recognition [45, 36, 60], video inpainting [28, 49, 13], video super-resolution [30, 5, 38], and frame interpolation [50, 33, 20], optical flow is a fundamental component, providing dense correspondences that serve as valuable clues for predictions.

A common assumption in optical flow estimation is that the appearance of corresponding locations in two images remains unchanged, as induced by optical flows. Traditionally, optical flow has been modeled as an optimization problem, maximizing visual similarities between corresponding locations across images with added regularization terms. The rapid development of deep learning and the availability of new training data have significantly advanced this field, particularly with methods based on deep convolutional neural networks. Recent approaches compute costs (i.e., visual similarities) between feature pairs, upon which flows are regressed.

The most successful architectural designs in optical flow are achieved by improving cost encoding and decoding techniques. PWC-Net [42] and RAFT [46] are two recent representative deep learning-based methods. PWC-Net builds hierarchical local cost volumes with warped features and progressively estimates flows from these local costs. RAFT creates a 4D cost volume of size H × W × H × W that measures similarities between all pairs of pixels in an H × W image pair and iteratively retrieves local costs within local windows for regressing flow residuals.

Recently, transformers have gained attention for their ability to model long-range relationships, which can benefit optical flow estimation. Perceiver IO [24] is a pioneering work that uses a transformer-based architecture for optical flow regression. However, it operates directly on the pixels of image pairs and overlooks the established domain knowledge of encoding visual similarities into costs for flow estimation. Consequently, it requires a large number of parameters and approximately 80 times more training examples to capture the desired input-output mapping. This raises the question: can we combine the advantages of transformers with the cost volume innovations of previous milestones? Addressing this question involves designing novel transformer architectures for optical flow estimation that can effectively aggregate information from the cost volume. In this paper, we introduce the novel optical Flow TransFormer (FlowFormer) to tackle this challenge.

FlowFormer adopts an encoder-decoder architecture for cost volume encoding and decoding. After constructing a 4D cost volume, FlowFormer comprises two main components: 1) a cost volume encoder that embeds the 4D cost volume into a latent cost space, fully encoding the cost information, and 2) a recurrent cost decoder that estimates flows from the encoded latent cost features. Compared with previous works, the key feature of FlowFormer is its adaptation of transformer architectures to effectively process cost volumes, which are compact yet rich representations widely explored in optical flow estimation communities, for estimating accurate optical flows.

A straightforward strategy to transform the 4D cost volume with transformers is to directly tokenize the 4D cost volume and apply transformers. However, this approach requires thousands of tokens, which is computationally prohibitive. To address this challenge, we propose two key designs in our cost encoder. First, we introduce a two-step tokenization: 1) converting each of the 2D cost maps, which record visual similarities between one source pixel and all target pixels, from the 4D cost volume into patches, as is commonly done in transformer networks, and 2) projecting cost-map patches of each cost map into K latent cost tokens. This transforms the H × W × H × W 4D cost volume into H × W × K tokens. Second, instead of performing self-attention among all tokens, we conduct attention over tokens within the same cost map and across different cost maps. In other words, we interweave aggregations of latent cost tokens belonging to the same source pixel with those across different source pixels.

Embattled Liberal National Party MP Andrew Laming has received a second rebuke from Prime Minister Scott Morrison in three days, following revelations that he had engaged in online bullying against two women. Brisbane resident Alix Russo told Nine News Brisbane on Thursday that the MP had falsely accused her of misappropriating money. Separately, another Brisbane woman, Sheena Hewlett, alleged that Laming had hidden in bushes and taken photographs of her in a park in 2019, an incident she reported to the police.

In an interview with Nine News, Ms. Russo, a charity worker, stated, “I don’t want to be attacked anymore,” revealing that she had reached a point of contemplating suicide due to the MP’s hurtful comments. Laming had made a post asserting, “Unfortunately for you, I make the rules and you follow them,” which deeply affected Ms. Russo.

Following a meeting over what Prime Minister Morrison labeled as “disgraceful” behavior, Mr. Laming issued an unequivocal apology to both women in parliament late on Thursday.

Studies on online social networks have been instrumental in understanding global social characteristics, such as human connections and behaviors. Many studies, including [1] - [5], have explored the structural properties of social graphs, where nodes represent users and edges signify friendships in online networks. Typically, researchers rely on sampling methods to analyze these graphs since complete graph data is often inaccessible to third-party researchers. Effective sampling techniques, such as breadth-first search and random walk, allow for the traversal of neighbor data, which can be obtained by querying users [1] - [3], [6] - [9].

Gjoka et al. introduced a framework known as re-weighted random walk to derive unbiased estimates of the structural properties of social graphs through random walks [7], [9]. This framework mitigates the sampling bias toward high-degree nodes usually induced by crawling methods. The process involves performing a random walk on the graph, selecting neighbors uniformly and randomly to generate a sequence of sampled nodes. These nodes are then re-weighted to adjust for the sampling bias inherent in the sequence's Markov property. The number of available queries during practical sampling periods is generally limited [10] - [12]. Consequently, several algorithms have been developed to estimate structural properties using minimal queries within this framework [10], [11], [13] - [20].

However, the re-weighted random walk framework primarily facilitates local structural property estimation. It necessitates sampling most graph data to correct the sampling bias when estimating global structural properties, like shortest-path metrics. Additionally, the re-weighted sample means alone do not sufficiently predict the original graph's structure, such as its visual representation. Analysts' interests in social network characteristics vary and include local structural properties (e.g., degree distribution, clustering coefficient), global structural properties (e.g., shortest-path lengths, betweenness centrality), and visual graph representations [21].

To bridge this gap, we investigate the social graph restoration problem: Given a small social graph sample acquired through crawling, our objective is to generate a graph that mirrors the original graph's structural properties as closely as possible. This generated graph should allow us to estimate both local and global structural properties and anticipate the original graph's visual representation. Current approaches to this problem include subgraph sampling [1] - [3], [6], [8], [22] - [24] and the method proposed by Gjoka et al. [15]. Subgraph sampling involves creating a subgraph from a set of edges obtained through a crawling method, presuming it to be a representative sample of the original graph. Conversely, Gjoka et al.'s method aims to generate a graph that retains estimates of local structural properties achieved through re-weighted random walk, with the goal of replicating the original graph's structural properties, even those not explicitly preserved.

In this paper, we propose a new method to restore the original social graph from a small sample obtained by random walk. Our method generates a graph that preserves local structural properties' estimates and the subgraph structure sampled by random walk. Initially, we construct a subgraph from the edges captured during a random walk and estimate local structural properties using the re-weighted random walk.

El Juzgado de lo Social número 5 de Valencia ha sentenciado que los 97 repartidores de la empresa Roodfoods Spain, matriz de Deliveroo, en esta ciudad son empleados y no autónomos y por tanto deberán ser contratados. Esta sentencia, hecha pública este jueves por el sindicato Intersindical, es fruto de la demanda interpuesta contra la empresa por la Tesorería General de la Seguridad Social en abril del año pasado.

El pleito, según ha informado hoy Intersindical, tuvo su origen en una comprobación sobre la actividad de la empresa realizada por la Inspección de Trabajo en diciembre de 2016, que concluyó con una reclamación de más de 160.000 euros por las cuotas de la Seguridad Social dejadas de ingresar por la empresa. Tras la impugnación de esta reclamación efectuada por la empresa, finalmente se celebró un juicio el pasado febrero en el que se analizó la relación laboral de 97 de estos repartidores -38 de ellos asesorados por Intersindical-, ya que si bien la plantilla media de Deliveroo en Valencia es de unas 40 personas, ha existido una gran rotación, según han explicado las mismas fuentes.

La empresa demandada es titular de una plataforma virtual (Deliveroo) que, a través de una aplicación informática, permite a un cliente previamente registrado pedir comida o bebida a restaurantes adheridos para que un repartidor se la lleve a su domicilio. Esta plataforma es gestionada por personal dado de alta en la empresa, que también es responsable de las relaciones con los clientes, restaurantes y personas que prestan el servicio de reparto.

En la sentencia se deja constancia de que la empresa remitía instrucciones a los repartidores para mejorar el servicio y les convocaba a reuniones obligatorias. Además, la empresa conocía en todo momento la geolocalización de los repartidores, así como los kilómetros realizados, y les pedía que comunicaran cualquier ausencia con 48 horas de antelación para que fuese aprobada por la empresa.

Por todo ello, la jueza considera que los verdaderos medios de producción en esta actividad no son las bicicletas y los teléfonos móviles de los repartidores, sino la plataforma digital que empareja oferta y demanda, y que la empresa “es la única poseedora de información necesaria para el manejo del negocio”. Asimismo, insiste en que el repartidor no es libre de aceptar o no un pedido sin sufrir consecuencias desfavorables, ya que la aplicación valora el servicio de cada uno de ellos con distintas métricas.

Cada repartidor debía disponer de un teléfono con datos y una bicicleta o moto y estar dado de alta en el régimen de autónomos; mientras que la empresa les proporcionaba una chaqueta, dos camisetas, pantalón y una caja para transportar los pedidos, entre otro material, reteniendo una fianza en concepto de equipamiento. Se menciona asimismo en la sentencia que los repartidores van identificados en mayor o menor medida como personal de Deliveroo y que “prestan sus servicios personales insertos en la organización empresarial conforme a los criterios y repartos que la misma establece”.

La empresa ha informado en un comunicado de que está dispuesta a recurrir, por considerar que la sentencia “no refleja la forma en la que los repartidores colaboran con la compañía”. “Deliveroo colabora con repartidores autónomos, ya que es este tipo de trabajo el que les permite tener la flexibilidad y el control que ellos quieren. Como autónomos, los repartidores pueden elegir si quieren trabajar o no, así como cuándo, cuánto y con quién hacerlo”, añade la nota. Por el contrario, la titular de Lo Social 5 ha concluido que estos repartidores prestan sus servicios integrados en la organización empresarial a la que pertenecen los medios de producción, que están constituidos básicamente por la plataforma tecnológica que conecta la oferta y la demanda.

القاهرة — سبوتنيك. يقوم التحالف العربي بقيادة السعودية والإمارات، منذ 26 آذار/مارس عام 2015 ودعماً للرئيس المعترف به عبد ربه منصور هادي، بعمليات جوية وبرية ضد مسلحي الحوثيين، الذين أحكموا سيطرتهم على العاصمة صنعاء وما حولها. في الوقت نفسه، سيطرت جماعات إرهابية مثل تنظيم "القاعدة" و"داعش" (المحظورين في روسيا وعدد من الدول) على محافظات وسط البلاد كحضرموت.

وأكدت وكالة الأنباء اليمنية "سبأ"، التي تبثُ من الرياض وعدن، أن "الجيش سيطر اليوم على دار سفيان وجبل السبد ومدرسة خالد وجبل البياضي ووادي الهجمة في جبهة طور الباحة". وأضافت الوكالة أن "المواجهات في جبهة الشريجة نتج عنها السيطرة على تبة القناص وتبة السحي المطلة على الخط الرابط بين الشريجة والراهدة".

خرج العديد من المواطنين في المدن الأمريكية إلى الشوارع، مشككين في دقة نتائج السباق الرئاسي الحامي بين الرئيس الأمريكي الحالي دونالد ترامب والمرشح الديمقراطي جو بايدن قبل إعلانها. شهد مركز المؤتمرات في فيلادلفيا تجمع المتظاهرين اليوم الجمعة، حيث تجمع الناس الذين يحملون ملصقات مكتوب عليها "يجب عد كل صوت" تحت أنظار ضباط الشرطة.

وقد أظهرت مقاطع الفيديو التي تم نشرها على وسائل التواصل الاجتماعي أشخاصًا يرقصون في زي قاعة المدينة والبيت الأبيض وصناديق البريد، إلى جانب شخصيات أخرى. "ما يحدث في مركز المؤتمرات تحول إلى مجموعة من الشخصيات المختلفة. يوجد قس يقول للناس أنهم سيذهبون إلى الجحيم وشخص يعزف على الهورن الفرنسي لكتم صوته، ورجل يرتدي زي جو بايدن، بالإضافة إلى شخص بزي ديناصور كبير"، كما ذكرت آنا أورسو.

ووفقًا لتقارير إعلامية أمريكية، فإن المرشح الديمقراطي في الانتخابات الرئاسية، جو بايدن، تقدم على منافسه الجمهوري، الرئيس دونالد ترامب، بفارق 917 صوتًا في ولاية جورجيا الحاسمة. "يوجد حفل كبير خارج مركز المؤتمرات هنا في فيلادلفيا. هل قاموا جميعًا بعمل الحسابات الصحيحة أم أنهم مشتعلون بالتفاؤل الشبابي؟ لا يزال هناك طريق طويل للذهاب"، كما ذكر ريتشارد هول.

The author advocates for the importance of studying Venus despite the risks involved, as there are many mysteries surrounding the planet. Venus, being in close proximity to Earth, can be considered our neighbor in terms of density and size. However, visiting or landing on Venus is perilous, as one can only survive there for a limited time, as spacecraft have not lasted more than a few hours due to the extreme conditions. The author emphasizes the similarities between Venus and Earth, as well as the potential dangers present on the planet, akin to those on Earth.

With Venus being comprised of 97% carbon dioxide and having temperatures much higher than on Earth, the environment there is vastly different from our own, making it a unique and challenging place to explore. Venus, often referred to as Earth's twin, is known for its scorching surface temperatures, which exceed those of any other planet, despite Mars being closer to the Sun. Venus, with its oceans, rocks, weather, and geological formations, bears resemblance to Earth, presenting a fascinating, yet hazardous, world to investigate.

En España, los perros son el mejor amigo del hombre. Son cariñosos, fieles y leales por naturaleza. Son capaces de cuidarnos cuando más lo necesitamos, por lo que también son la mejor compañía para las personas que viven solas. Sin duda, son uno de los animales de compañía favoritos en la mayoría de hogares de España. Sin embargo, a pesar de este vínculo tan único que existe siempre entre perro y compañero humano, también existen malentendidos en esta relación.

Al igual que los humanos tenemos necesidades básicas, nuestros fieles amigos peludos también. Por lo tanto, es esencial que conozcamos bien estas necesidades, tanto físicas como mentales, para establecer una buena comunicación con ellos. También es importante tener claro aquello que puede molestar o incomodar a nuestro fiel compañero. Si queremos mejorar la comunicación con nuestro perro, aquí te descubrimos 5 cosas que los perros odian de los humanos.

En primer lugar, hablarles mucho sin gestos o palabras que puedan entender puede confundir o poner nervioso a nuestro perro. Es importante utilizar palabras cortas que pueda entender y acompañarlas de gestos o lenguaje corporal. Esto ayudará a que nos entienda mejor y se sienta más relajado.

En segundo lugar, abrazar y dar besos en exceso puede hacer que nuestro perro se sienta nervioso e incómodo. Para los perros, abrazar y besar es algo diferente a lo que para los humanos. Pueden interpretarlo como una señal de dominancia o sumisión. Si notas que tu perro está incómodo, lo mejor es no excederse en besos y abrazos.

En tercer lugar, regañar o gritarle sin motivo no es una buena forma de educar a nuestro perro. Hay formas más efectivas de corregir su comportamiento, como dedicar tiempo a su aprendizaje con órdenes sencillas y motivarles con paseos, juegos o golosinas para perros. Gritarles solo generará confusión y energía negativa.

En cuarto lugar, pasear con prisa y sin permitirles explorar el entorno es un error. Los perros necesitan olfatear, hacer sus necesidades, explorar y relacionarse con otros perros. Un paseo tranquilo en el que les permitamos disfrutar de estas acciones será mucho más saludable para su bienestar que uno rápido con tirones.

Por último, los perros odian cuando sus compañeros humanos están ausentes. Para ellos, nunca estarán seguros de que volveremos. Por eso, cuando nos ven aparecer por la puerta, tienen tanto entusiasmo. Abandonar a un perro es traumático para ellos y nunca lo entenderán. Por eso, es importante dedicarles todo el tiempo posible y nunca abandonarlos.

En resumen, para mejorar la relación con nuestro perro es importante conocer sus necesidades, comunicarnos de manera clara y respetar su bienestar. Evitar hablarles sin gestos o palabras que puedan entender, abrazar y besar en exceso, regañar o gritar sin motivo, pasear con prisa y sin dejarles explorar el entorno, y estar presentes en su vida son aspectos fundamentales para mantener una buena relación con nuestros fieles amigos peludos.

وزاد مؤشر ستوكس أوروبا بالتعاملات الصباحية يوم الخميس ليواصل مكاسبه للجلسة الثانية على التوالي، مع تحقيق أغلبية البورصات والقطاعات الرئيسية في المنطقة نتائج إيجابية.
